parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The page number. Default value: 1. Pages start from page 1.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The timestamp when the IDC scan task ends. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page. Default value: 20. If you leave this parameter empty, 20 entries are returned on each page.

>  We recommend that you do not leave this parameter empty.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The timestamp when the IDC scan task starts. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: TaskName
parameters.description: The name of the IDC scan task.
